reviewText:
ok, just not enough drama or connection between actors.
even these type of films need chemistry between leading actors

It was with some trepidation that I purchased this film. My experience of this genre was directed mainly through the American market. The action came thick and fast, excuse the play on words. I have a quite large collection of this style, all in DVD and I can say the quality was phenominal. I was able to feeze frame on the action without any of the distortion normally experienced with VHS.
The boys are all good looking and obviously work out, I would love to know where their gym is!!
To finish I would like to offer my services as body oiler to Bruce the lead actor.
